job_title: Assistant to the General Secretary in Birmingham, England
pros: It was a pleasure commuting here every day from Coventry. The General Secretary is a wonderful fellow and was very mindful of my needs. They used to pay the wages at the earliest without a delay! I learnt a lot of how a charity functions here. The Gen Sec was always open to comments as well and would ask my opinion about a lot of matters. He was and is an impressive fellow!
cons: I really can't think of a con here.
